publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3766 David McLetchie on behalf of the Selection Panel: Appointment of the Scottish Public Services Ombudsmanâ€”That the Parliament nominates Jim Martin to Her Majesty The Queen for appointment as the Scottish Public Services Ombudsman. Supported by: Ian McKee*, Mary Mulligan*, Alison McInnes*, Duncan McNeil*
